    Methods in LokiViewer.Object with parameters of type Face
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    FaceComp.compare(Face f1, Face f2)
    Compare the z-ordering of two faces
    compare their border first, if they are separate in x-y plain, then rendering order doesn't matter.If they areseperate in z axis, then dicide the order by their depth.
    private int
    FaceComp.containing(Face f1, Face f2)
    Run after knowing that f1 and f2 has no intersecting edges in x-y plain.Then we know it is either f1 and f2 containing each other, other they are Separate.
    private double
    FaceComp.getZValue(Vertex v, Face face)
    If v is in a face's x-y projection, return the z valve of v's projection in face.
    Algorithm: Assume the projection is v', and the three vertices on face is v1, v2, and v3.
    private int
    FaceComp.intersection(Face f1, Face f2)
    If any two edges in two faces has intersection in x-y plain and has a Z value difference, then the deeper face should be rendered earlier
    private boolean
    FaceComp.pointInTriangle(Vertex v, Face face)
    Return if a vertex is in the face in xy projection
    Algorithm: Assume the vertex is v.
